messages.subject: Re: Free ID?
messages.msgSnippet: Joyce, Thanks, I went straight to the link, and joined.   Hopefully they will accept me, and this will help my son.  My only thing is, I want him to be happy,
messages.messageBody:
Joyce,

Thanks, I went straight to the link, and joined. Hopefully they
will accept me, and this will help my son. My only thing is, I want
him to be happy, and to know that he can take pride in who he is.
(This was a problem in public school--we are working on rebuilding
his self-esteem.)

----Vanessa








--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Joyce Fetteroll

messages.subject: Free ID?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I was reading a post about an ID card.  I tried clicking on the address provided, but didn t get anything to come up.  Where do you get a card?  Just
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I was reading a post about an ID card. I tried clicking on the
address provided, but didn't get anything to come up. Where do you
get a card? Just wondering.

I also have a question. I live in South LYon, and am looking for
someone to play with my 11 yo son, or at least email him back and
forth. He is is good kid, very mild mannored, and enjoys building
bionicles, playing video games, etc. He misses his two friends who
have moved out of the city, and into other school districts. I am
doing this for him, not for me.

If anyone is interested, please let me know. I also have a 9 year old
daughter who would be interested in playing with some girls around her
age.

Thanks,
